name: Sacred Saga Online
description: Sacred Saga Online is a free-to-play MMORPG set in a fantasy world with astonishing 3D graphic design and very good and varied soundtrack.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window Vista Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 50 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Soundblaster
recommended_requirements: OS: Window7 Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Standard DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Soundblaster
